headline: Arroz con Leche (Rice Pudding)
name: Arroz con Leche (Rice Pudding)
description: This arroz con leche (rice pudding), scented with cinnamon, is a Guatemalan version of rice pudding, where rice is simmered with water, milk, and sugar.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine water and rice in a bowl; soak at least 30 minutes.
Bring water and rice to a boil in a saucepan; reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.
Stir milk, sugar, cinnamon stick, and salt into rice; simmer until thick and the consistency of pudding, about 20 minutes. Discard cinnamon stick before serving.
